Headline: Timeline Of Morieth
Text: This is a test of using google spreadsheets as a source for the timeline tool. This is a 'title' slide, so it doesn't need a date. It automatically occurs first, and doesn't appear in the timeline below.
Media Caption: Chicago by zach.wise

Headline: Elves Arrive In Morieth
Text: The world of Morieth is dark. The elves come through the portal tree. They use their magic to create a sun and a moon. They learn the magic of the world. they believe that when their bodies die, their spirits will live on through the natural magic of morieth if they follow their religion

Headline: Magical Creatures
Text: With the light of the sun and moon, the elves realise that Morieth has magical creatures which have been living in morieth for years before the elves arrived. The elves become friends with them and learn about them.
Media Caption: A video about how to make timelines!

Headline: Mirakas
Text: Mirakas is an elf who comes through the portal with the other elves. He believes that the elves are superior, and wants to dominate other life in Morieth. he wants to draw more power from the land of Morieth to achieve this. The elves disagree. Mirakas moves to the western lands of Morieth.

Headline: Humans Arrive
Text: The humans arrive through the portal and make their homes in the grassy lands of Morieth. They make Farms and Villages. They become friends with the elves

Headline: Dwarfs Arrive
Text: The Dwarves Arrive In Morieth through the portal and make the mines their home. They are rarely seen or heard from because they are busy mining.

Headline: Gnolls Arrive
Text: When the Gnolls arrive, most of the 'good' places in Morieth are taken, they go to the western lands of Morieth as their home, where it is quite dark

Headline: Goblins Arrive
Text: The goblins arrive at the same time as the Gnolls, most of the 'good' places in Morieth are taken, they go to the western lands of Morieth as their home, where it is quite dark

Headline: Peace
Text: All those in Morieth mostly live in peace.

Headline: Mountain Of Wrath
Text: The volcano in the western lands is called 'The Mountain of Wrath' by Mirakas.

Headline: Corruption of Gnolls and Goblins
Text: Because there is not much light, no food or water in the west, the Gnolls and Goblins become dirty, savage carnivores. They sometimes eat each other.

Headline: Mirikas Begins Joining Forces
Text: Mirakas sees the desperation of the Gnolls and goblins, and ask them to join his cause. in return he promises access to food and water outside of the west.

Headline: Elves And Humans Thrive
Text: Because they work together, the humans and elves do very well for themselves. they begin to build defenses, weapons and castles so they can protect each other.

Headline: Mirikas protects himself
Text: Mirikas notices the alliance of the humans and elves and sees it as a threat to his success. He knows they will try and stop him He looks to protect himself. he makes armour, forged of dark metal and with seams of fiery lava with spikes. crown of spikes and fangs in the helmet. mirikas also builds defences in the west - a 20 ft tall wall of metal protected by gnolls and goblins.

Headline: mirakas makes bracelet plans
Text: because mirikas wasn't part of the religion of the elves, he plans to make a bracelet of great power which would allow him his own version of an afterlife - to preserve his spirit. using his own soul he plans to put a copy of himself inside the bracelet, allowing him protection and giving him great power, including being able to corrupt and influence others.

Headline: elves and humans Act
Text: The Elves and Humans hear that Mirakas is up to something and look to put a stop to it.

Headline: Mirikas Battle
Text: men and Elves fight against the evil creatures (gnolls and Goblins mainly). many from both sides begin dying.

Headline: Forging Of the Bracelet
Text: While everyone is in battle, Mirikas completes his plans to create the bracelet in the mountain of wrath

Headline: power of the Bracelet
Text: Mirikas joins the battle with his bracelet. he begins slaughtering all around him.

Headline: Attempting to kill Mirikas
Text: The human king at the time (not specifically named) and the elven king (also not specifically named) fight mirakas. The elf king skewers Mirakas with his sword from behind but it does nothing. the human king steps in to defend his soldiers. The king's sword slices through the wrist of Mirikas, separating him from his bracelet.

Headline: Human king dies
Text: As the Human king attacks mirikas, a goblin stabs him, killing him.

Headline: Mirikas Dies
Text: Mirikas turns to ash, leaving only his armour and bracelet

Headline: Evil Creatures Flee
Text: The Gnolls and Goblins flee the battle after seeing their leader fall

Headline: Dreneth Takes bracelet
Text: The bracelet of Mirikas is taken by the human king's son 'King Dreneth'

Headline: Bracelet corrupts
Text: King Dreneth rules over the humans with with the Bracelet. it delays his aging allowing him to live for over 100 years, but corrupts him, and makes him selfish.

Headline: Ambushed by goblins
Text: While riding across morieth with his men, dreneth is ambushed by goblins. Dreneth falls from his horse, and while defending himself is killed by arrows from behind. he falls into a lake and the bracelet is lost.

Headline: time goes on
Text: With the bracelet lost, the land of morieth continues, with dreneth's descendants ruling over morieth. What happened with mirikas is mostly forgotten or becomes legend.

Headline: The Elves
Text: The elves build a home for themselves in the forests of Morieth and call it 'Winterfell City'. The elves learn to make magic armour and items.

Headline: Meeting Shadowfax
Text: A huge white horse which is one of the creatures that had been in morieth before the elves arrived is named by the elves 'Shadowfax'. they make it a home. They find it has air magic powers, but also find it difficult to deal with.

Headline: Gifting Shadowfax
Text: The elves are grateful for the help in defeating mirikas. they gift Shadowfax to the humans, and it seems to like the wide open grassa round the castle better.

Headline: Elves teach humans
Text: grateful that the humans helped them, the elves teach the human king and queen (Not named) about magic. The elven king warns the humans not to combine spells as it is dangerous and unpredictable. The elves allow the humans access to their archives. As the humans get more excited about magic, they attempt to make their own spells, creating new branches of magic, despite being told to be careful.

Headline: Human wizards
Text: When experimenting with magic, the human king and queen do a spell which makes them Wizards and witches without them knowing.

Headline: Child of human king and queen
Text: The Human king and queen have a child (unnamed)

Headline: Elf King notices
Text: The Elf king (unnamed) notices something is different about the king and queen. After asking them what they have been up to he finds that they did a spell which accidentally made them witches and wizards, and this includes their son. The magic scrolls are hidden and they are told off.

Headline: Elf king offers guidance
Text: Seeing that the humans lost their way so easily, the elf king teaches the human king and queen about their spirit beliefs, hoping that knowledge of what happens after their death would help guide them on a better path. introduces pendants which tell them what they need to improve on.

Headline: Wizard Power
Text: Wizards rule humans and are respected for their power. help humans stay safe and rebuild after conflicts. wizards pass knowledge through their families.

Headline: Dwarfs and Gnolls alliance
Text: When the Gnolls and Dwarfs meet after the big battle, the Gnolls offer the Dwarfs a deal: if they helped defend the Gnolls and goblins, they would offer the mining lands in the west to the dwarfs so they could get more resources. in their greed the accept.

Headline: King Nicholas, Queen Rowena, Aronin
Text: After a few hundred years were introduced to the current leaders at dorston castle who are descendants of the first wizard king and queen; A wizard king called Nicholas, His witch queen Rowena, and their son Aronin

Headline: Amelia and Alistair
Text: King nicholas had a brother who died in battle with his wife. his brother had two children, Amelia and Alistair who are humans. nicholas treats his niece and Nephew as if they are his own children. They are adults and are well trained in battle. amelia isn't allowed to be in battle so helps around the castle

Headline: Resentment and desperation
Text: Attacks of evil creatures increase over the years because of increasing resentment and raiding for supplies.

Headline: Creation of Oracle outpost
Text: Oracle outpost was built because of the increasing attacks of creatures over the years. It is defended by a group known as the Rauxulian rangers. Over time this quickly turns to ruins through all of the attacks against it. either attackers have to go through the outpost, or make a long journey around it.

Headline: Beginning Of Raiders
Text: Raiders are basically humans who had been banished from the castle and other settlements because of bad behavior. forced to live without the protection of the king, and very little food or resources they quickly become desperate and savage people who resent the castle and what it stands for.

Headline: Beginning of Pirates
Text: Raiders Struggled on land, but some managed to build or steal ships and make lives for themselves out at sea driven by greed and adventure.

Headline: Growing and expanding
Text: As the years go by, Winterfell city expands. eventually it is split into two parts. The part in the forest which the king, Zaratash rules over, the other half was built into the Orhillian Mountains and ruled over by his brother Venalli

Headline: Flaming Signal Beacon
Text: A Flaming Beacon system is established between Winterfell city and Dorston Castle, allowing the elves and humans to signal each other if they are in trouble.

Headline: Zaratash And Arneth
Text: Some time during this period Zaratash becomes king of the elves, and his wife, arneth is queen.

Headline: Selina's Origins
Text: When Selina is young her mother is killed by raiders, and when a little older, her father, who was a rauxulian ranger, was killed by gnolls. She is forced to fend for herself before the age of 30.

Headline: Selina
Text: Selina is a human citizen at Dorston castle. Selena is largely a pacifist.

Headline: Selina visits Nicholas
Text: Selina visits king nicholas after her mother dies. she complains about how dangerous it is to live in the castle and how vulnerable it is to attack. King Nicholas takes pity on her and offers to teach her some magic so that she can defend herself.She also makes herself a purple robe.

Headline: Selina feels unsafe
Text: Selina continues to feel unsafe as she continues to learn magic. the king and his wife reassure her, and tell her the attacks are under control, but this doesn't do much to help.the king and queen are busy, and they suggest that selina might be able to find a place outside of the castle which could be quieter.

Headline: Selina Completes Training
Text: Selina makes a staff out of some wood from nearby Fleshwood forest. she imbues it with power.

Headline: Selina travels to the misty mountains
Text: Still worried, Selina packs some things and takes an ox to the Misty mountains (a mountain range) nearby, which is where St. nicholas suggested.

Headline: The Mountain pass
Text: Selina travels over the first snowy mountain and makes her way down the other side - the environment becomes rocky and jagged, and she finds the entrance to an underground cave system - a mountain pass and camps outside.

Headline: Entering The pass
Text: Selina realises the rope bridge that leads to the cave is no place for an Ox. she takes some stuff, and sends the ox back towards the castle as she enters the cave.

Headline: Cave Defence
Text: Selina notices lots of dead bodies filled with arrows. she comes across another rope bridge and some gnolls who start to chase her. She uses some of her magic (shockwave, Shrinking) to defend herself, and manages to exit the cave.

Headline: Mountain ledge
Text: After coming out of the cave she find herself on a different mountain - ahead of her she sees a cave at the top of a slope. She sees a silhouette of someone on the ledge,a dwarf?

Headline: Grelvin Dwarf
Text: Selina meets Grelvin - a dwarf who lives in the cave. Grelvin seems very nice and offers selina food and shelter. Grelvin notices her staff and is interested by it. Selina explains she's not technically a witch. Grelvin offers her a bed for the night. Grelvin likes Selina because she is a pacifist and shares a lot of similar values as he does.

Headline: Origins of Grelvin the Dwarf
Text: Grelvin was born in the dwarven mines. His uncle is a leader of the dwarves called Tahvo. Grelvin realised the greed and obsession of the Dwarfs and wanted to get away from it. when he was young he ran away from home and came to live in the misty mountains. His mother was a human, and so grelvin is technically a half-dwarf known as a 'renegade dwarf.' for a while now Grelvin makes a bit of a living/ survives by completing specialist orders for things that people visit want made. Grelvin usually gets tasked with making weapons and armour, but he can make much more.

Headline: Grelvin shows his skill
Text: The next morning Selina asks if she could watch Grelvin make something. Grelvin says he will make her something. it is revealed that the last thing that Grelvin made was the king's ring, a golden ring with a green gem (Nicholas knowing about grelvin explains why he mentioned the misty mountains). Grelvin makes a copy of the ring which fits selina perfectly.

Headline: The Rauxulian rangers
Text: Gawain is the son of Marius. they are Rauxulian rangers. They go on an adventure out of the outpost.

Headline: about the rangers
Text: Rauxulian rangers are like guards of the castle, but elite. they are from a long line of humans who have extra long life, and the only way to tell is the silver ring with a picture of a spirit tree on it.There are around 100 rauxulian rangers at the castle of dorston, 12 of them in the outpost. The rauxulian rangers used to be very paranoid - they were unfamiliar and scared of the magical creatures who inhabited the world. this made them less good at their job so the king asked the elves to enchant their rings with the power to talk to creatures. facing their fears worked and they now have a close connection with the creatures.

Headline: Rangers Find Gypsy Cave
Text: Whilst exploring and looking for a safe place to camp, Marius and Gawain find a door in a cliff which is illuminated with torches and glows in the shape of the door. after reading an inscription 'Beware: The choices we make determine our futures.' , the rock face opens, leading to a cave/tunnel.
